Text:
This is the PDF for the older hardcover edition of "The Bell Curve" which is what prompted the Mainstream Science on Intelligence to be produced in the first place:

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/4638449/The_Bell_Curve.pdf

Sadly this version doesn't contain the afterword that Murray wrote to address the common criticisms that are always made against the book.

You'll have to buy the paperback for that.

Oh, and the description should say, "against** or in favor of many of it's conclusions."

Pretty clear now that sleep deprivation definitely has a negative impact on cognitive ability :-)
